overview.en: OK Node community (or OKNC) community platform created , managed and developed by a group of block chain makers and players together. The community doesn’t accept any extra finance &public financing . all community participants can enjoy the multiple benefits of community development . including (not limited to )extended value by block chain project needs and cash benefits brought by the e-commerce and other internet .OKNC is the landing application platform to practice the characteristics of many block chains , the node community doles out most of rights and interests of coin freely, that is ,many community participants will obtain the future available digital assets, and the benefits of most community operating will be paid to all token holders freely in the open community mode
overview.zh: OK Node Community(简称OKNC，即OK节点社区)是由一群区块链创客、玩家共同治理，开放式分布式管理、抱团发展的社区平台，社区不接受外部任何一分钱的融资&众筹，所有社区参与者都能享受社区发展带来的多重收益，包括（不限于）区块链项目节点供应延伸出来的价值，电商等互联网分享经济带来的现金收益，OKNC是践行众多区块链特性的落地应用平台，节点社区将大部分的权益代币免费发放出去，即让众多社区参与者获得未来可期的数字资产，又以开放的社区模式将大部分社区运营的收益无偿发放给所有代币持有者。注：此为 OKNC 官方发行的旧 OKNC 代币。新 OKNC 合约地址：0x0228528581c01a303d59d8cf6b72bd5a5d219458
